sections.heading: Compensation; waiver by employee invalid
sections.text: No agreement by an employee to waive his or her rights to compensation under the Nebraska Workers' Compensation Act shall be valid.SourceLaws 1913, c. 198, § 31, p. 593;R.S.1913, § 3672;C.S.1922, § 3054;C.S.1929, § 48-131;R.S.1943, § 48-131;Laws 1986, LB 811,
